game.shortDescription: Nova Nukers!는 최대 4명이 함께 온라인 및 로컬에서 플레이할 수 있는 멀티 플레이 전투 게임입니다! 친구들과 여러 다양한 폭탄 아이템을 사용하며 다채로운 행성을 즐기세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Nova Nukers! is a multiplayer battle game for up to 4 players (online and local)! Explode your friends on colourful planets with a large variety of bombastic items!

reviewHighlights.text: In this game you run around on a planet with up to three other players and instead of blasting them to bits, you try to stun them with various weapons...
